properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 9 at 4:00PM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...During the Small Craft Advisory, expect sustained winds
up to 23 knots from the south with gusts up to 31 knots. The
largest significant waves will be 4 feet with a potential
maximum wave height of 5 feet. During the Gale Watch, expect
sustained winds up to 32 knots from the north with gusts up to
44 knots. The largest significant waves will be 9 feet with a
potential maximum wave height of 13 feet.

* WHERE...Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to
Inner Saginaw Bay and Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to
Bay Port MI.

* WHEN...During the Small Craft Advisory, the maximum winds are
expected around 4 PM EST Thursday with the largest waves
expected around 4 PM EST Thursday. During the Gale Watch, the
maximum winds are expected around 11 PM EST Saturday with the
largest waves expected around 11 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST FRIDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
